ValidationRule.description: Force update of the Handbook Setup Specialist field when the Contract Received Date field has been populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding" ), ( NOT(ISNULL(Contract_Received_Date__c)) ), ( ISBLANK(Handbook_Setup_Specialist__c) ), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter your name in the Handbook Setup Specialist field to move on.
